EmailTemplate.subject: Les fêtes approchent à grands pas!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Consultez l'offre en ligne <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra.aspx?cmp=EBBIGDEALS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Centre d'aubaines <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0czra.aspx?cmp=EBBIGDEALS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm.aspx?cmp=EBCLEARANCE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Liquidation ! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/_/N-1z0bsdm.aspx?cmp=EBCLEARANCE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
Nouveaux <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/category/_/N-1z0crxh?cmp=EBNEWPRODUCTS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Livraison GRATUITE pour les commandes admissibles de 50 $ ou plus* <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/HolidayProductCollections.aspx?cmp=EBHOLIDAYEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> C'est le moment de faire vos provisions pour les fêtes
Procurez-vous dès maintenant ce dont vous avez besoin pour bien profiter de cette période occupée. Magasiner <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/dcr/sites/core/HolidayProductCollections.aspx?cmp=EBHOLIDAYEN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Services aux entreprises <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx?cmp=EBSERVICES2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Services aux entreprises Une série complète de services conçus en fonction des besoins de votre entreprise <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx?cmp=EBSERVICES2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>. Nos services <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/service-solutions.aspx?cmp=EBSERVICES2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Service à la clientèle <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Modalites <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Confidentialite <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
* Achat minimum requis avant les taxes et après déduction des rabais. Les commandes passées à l'extérieur de nos zones commerciales locales, d'articles surdimensionnés et en commande spéciale ne sont pas admissibles. Les commandes non admissibles sont assujetties à des frais de livraison selon la taille, le poids et le lieu de livraison de la commande (frais minimum de 9,95 $). D'autres conditions s'appliquent. Consultez les modalités à l'adresse grandandtoy.com/modalites ou appelez le 1 866 391-8111 pour plus de détails.
